home.title: Nomadic Guardians
home.subtitle: Underwater Robotics Team from Astana, Kazakhstan
home.description: We are a school STEM team participating in international SeaPerch West Asia 2026 competitions. Our mission is to design, build, and operate Remotely Operated underwater Vehicles (ROVs) for challenging submarine missions.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To inspire and educate the next generation of engineers and scientists through hands-on experience in underwater robotics, fostering innovation, teamwork, and technical excellence.

goals.title: Our Goals
goals.item1: Excel in SeaPerch West Asia 2026 competition
goals.item2: Develop advanced ROV design and engineering skills

plans.title: Season Plans
plans.item4: Share knowledge through articles and resources

sponsor.title: Our Sponsor
sponsor.description: We are grateful for the support of our sponsors who make our participation in international competitions possible.

articles.title: Articles
articles.subtitle: Engineering solutions, ROV design, and competition insights
articles.noArticles: No articles yet. Check back soon!
articles.author: Author

telegramBot.title: Telegram Bot
telegramBot.subtitle: Get instant answers about SeaPerch Manual
telegramBot.description: Our Telegram bot is designed to help you quickly find information from the SeaPerch Manual Book. Ask questions about rules, requirements, technical specifications, and more.

examples.title: Example Questions
examples.q1: What are the requirements for the Technical Design Report?
examples.q2: What is the maximum ROV size?
examples.q3: What safety rules must be followed?

resources.title: Resources
resources.subtitle: Useful materials for SeaPerch competition preparation

tdr.description: Communicate intentional design process and description of SeaPerch ROV for 2026

outreach.title: Community Outreach
outreach.description: One-page PDF with photos, videos, and description of community contribution. Note: This section is not scored but may be considered for special awards.
